articles.author: Valentin Khorounzhiy
articles.title: Marquez and Bagnaia disagree over Portimao MotoGP clash - The Race
articles.description: MotoGP championship protagonists Pecco Bagnaia and Marc Marquez have made it clear they don't see eye-to-eye over their race-ruining Portuguese Grand Prix collision
articles.content: MotoGP championship protagonists Pecco Bagnaia and Marc Marquez have made it clear they don't see eye-to-eye over their race-ruining Portuguese Grand Prix collision - even if they kept their disagree… [+3552 chars]
